div.p: The authors would like to thank the Water Research Commission (WRC), the University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) the International Water Management Institute (IWMI) and the Sustainable and Healthy Food Systems (SHEFS) Programme, supported through the Wellcome Trustâ€™s Our Planet, Our Health Programme [grant number: 205200/Z/16/Z] for supporting the WEF nexus initiative in southern Africa and South Africa and for the support in writing this manuscript.
